title: Do Technical Implementations Help Physicians: An Evaluation of a New Procedure Documentation Tool on Provider Efficiency in the Electronic Health Record
details: P Ioerger, T Smith - Kansas Journal of Medicine, 2024
abstract: Introduction. Provider time spent in the electronic health record (EHR) continues to increase, adding stress to an already demanding field. This study quantified the impact of a new EHR procedure documentation tool designed to reduce charting …

title: Assessing GPT and DeepL for Terminology Translation in the Medical Domain: A Comparative Study on the Human Phenotype Ontology
details: N Richard, A BERGER, K Dominik, T MUELLER… - 2024
abstract: Background This paper presents a comparative study of two state-of-the-art language models, OpenAI's GPT and DeepL, in the context of terminology translation within the medical domain. Methods This study was conducted on the Human …
